Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Vacant land located in the coveted South Fields area of Wasatch County. This property is surrounded by small farms and horse facilities in a rural setting with unobstructed views of Mount Timpanogos and Deer Creek Reservoir.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The subject property consists of the North Parcels and the South Parcels of the Top of the World Estates Subdivision, in Cottonwood Heights. Zoning is F-1-43 or F-20, Foothill Recreational.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Excellent Access to I-15 in West Haven, Utah

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Offers due at 5:00 PM on May 24, 2021

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Vacant residential land for sale! This 3.4 acres plot is zoned R1-20 and all utilities are available. This amazing development opportunity is just minutes to I-15, American Fork Hospital, the local high school, and many retail amenities. BYU, Lehi, and the Provo Airport are all within a half hour drive from this location, and Salt Lake City is only 40 minutes away.
All offers are due at 5:00 PM on May 24, 2021.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 3.4 Acres of Residential Land for Sale

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Approximately 10 acres from the 33.48 acre parcel (final legal description to be verified by a survey)
Rare Salt Lake City East Side land
Water through Draper City with impact fee
Borders Salt Lake and Utah County

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Rare Salt Lake City East side land with premium 360 degree views. 5.8 miles from I-15, 26 miles to Salt Lake City and 30 miles to Salt Lake International Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to present an opportunity to purchase a ten acre estate near SunCrest with amazing views of Salt Lake Valley, and immediate
access to parks and trails. In 2018, Draper City surplussed a portion of
the Deer Ridge property, located in the SunCrest area just west of the Maple Hollow Trailhead Park. The plan is to sell approximately 10 acres as a single estate lot and add the majority (approximately 245 acres) of the Deer Ridge property into the Traverse Range Land Conservation Easement. This will allow for additional trail-heads and potential multi-use trails to be  developed and accessed by the community.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 10 Acres for Sale in Draper, Single Family Estate Lot

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: On the corner of 8200 South and 6400 West, this is an easily accessible lot, close to Mountain View Corridor and Bacchus Hwy, surrounded by established single-family communities.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Vacant land with commercial development potential. This area has seen major development over the last year and continues to see steady development with planned communities, and new housing. The zoning for this piece is Neighborhood Commercial Master Plan. The city will consider multiple uses.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Two points of access via access easements

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 4.167 acres of vacant land for sale in Herriman, Utah. Current zoning for the property is R-2-10 and has two points of access via access easements. All offers will be reviewed after property owner's mandatory 30-day listing period expires.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 4.167 Acres of Land for Sale in Herriman, Utah
